name: imageSetDrawingTransparency
description: Specifies the degree of transparency of drawing functions.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: percent
params.description: Percent of transparency, a floating point number in range 0-100

examples.title: Using setDrawingTransparency member function
examples.description: CF11+ Create an new image. With the new image write transparent text
